entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 1:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -17.7°C
Wind: NNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
